properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM STORE
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM APPLICATION
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM MEMBER
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM PRODUCT_ODR JOIN KAKAO_PAYMENT ON ORDER_NO_K = ORDER_NO JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT STORE_NAME , STORE_NO , STORE_PHONE , TYPE_NAME AS type_name , STORE_STATUS FROM STORE JOIN TYPE USING(STORE_TYPE) ORDER BY STORE_NO DESC)A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT APP_NO , USER_NO , STORE_TYPE , STORE_NAME , STORE_ADDRESS , STORE_PHONE , STORE_TIME , BUSINESS_NO , STORE_PRICE , APP_DATE , APP_YN , REFUSE , USER_NAME , TYPE_NAME , APP_TYPENAME FROM APPLICATION JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) JOIN TYPE USING(STORE_TYPE) JOIN APP_TYPE USING(APP_YN) ORDER BY APP_NO DESC)A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , USER_LEVEL , ENROLL_DATE , BALANCE , BLACKLIST , STATUS FROM MEMBER ORDER BY USER_NO DESC)A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , ORDER_QTY , ORDER_PRICE , TOTAL_PRICE , GIFT_YN , PAY_NO_K , PAY_DATE_K , PAY_COMPANY_K , USER_ID , USER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE FROM PRODUCT_ODR JOIN KAKAO_PAYMENT ON ORDER_NO_K = ORDER_NO JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) ORDER BY PAY_NO_K DESC)A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT APP_NO , USER_NO , STORE_TYPE , STORE_NAME , STORE_ADDRESS , STORE_PHONE , STORE_TIME , BUSINESS_NO , STORE_PRICE , APP_DATE , APP_YN , REFUSE , USER_NAME , TYPE_NAME , APP_TYPENAME , EMAIL FROM APPLICATION JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) JOIN TYPE USING(STORE_TYPE) JOIN APP_TYPE USING(APP_YN) WHERE APP_NO = ?

SELECT USER_NO , ORDER_QTY , ORDER_PRICE , TOTAL_PRICE , GIFT_YN , PAY_NO_K , PAY_DATE_K , PAY_COMPANY_K , USER_ID , USER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE FROM PRODUCT_ODR O JOIN KAKAO_PAYMENT K ON K.ORDER_NO_K = O.ORDER_NO JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE PAY_NO_K = ?
SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , USER_LEVEL , ENROLL_DATE , BALANCE , BLACKLIST , STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT STORE_TYPE , TYPE_NAME FROM TYPE
UPDATE STORE SET STORE_NAME = ? , BUSINESS_NO = ? , STORE_PHONE = ? , STORE_ADDRESS = ? , STORE_TYPE = ? , STORE_TIME = ? , STORE_PRICE = ? , STORE_STATUS = ? WHERE STORE_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_PWD = ? , USER_NAME = ? , EMAIL = ? , PHONE = ? , ADDRESS = ? , BALANCE = ? , STATUS = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT IMG_NO , APP_NO , IMG_ROOT , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , STATUS FROM APP_STORE_IMAGE WHERE APP_NO = ?

INSERT INTO STORE ( STORE_NO ,STORE_NAME ,STORE_TYPE ,STORE_ADDRESS ,STORE_PHONE ,STORE_TIME ,BUSINESS_NO ,STORE_PRICE ,STORE_STATUS ) SELECT SEQ_STORE.NEXTVAL ,A.STORE_NAME ,A.STORE_TYPE ,A.STORE_ADDRESS ,A.STORE_PHONE ,A.STORE_TIME ,A.BUSINESS_NO ,A.STORE_PRICE ,'N' FROM APPLICATION A WHERE APP_NO = ?

INSERT INTO STORE_IMAGE ( IMG_NO ,APP_NO ,IMG_ROOT ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,IMG_LEVEL ,STATUS) SELECT STI_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,A.APP_NO ,A.IMG_ROOT ,A.ORIGIN_NAME ,A.CHANGE_NAME ,A.IMG_LEVEL ,A.STATUS FROM APP_STORE_IMAGE A WHERE APP_NO = ?
UPDATE (SELECT * FROM APP_TYPE JOIN APPLICATION USING (APP_YN)) SET APP_YN = 'Y' WHERE APP_NO = ?
UPDATE (SELECT * FROM APP_TYPE JOIN APPLICATION USING (APP_YN) ) SET APP_YN = 'N' ,REFUSE = ? WHERE APP_NO = ?
UPDATE APPLICATION SET REFUSE = ? WHERE APP_NO = ?
SELECT REFUSE FROM APP_TYPE JOIN APPLICATION USING (APP_YN) WHERE APP_NO = ?
SELECT SUM(PAY_PRICE_K) sum FROM KAKAO_PAYMENT WHERE TO_DATE(PAY_DATE_K) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM KAKAO_PAYMENT WHERE TO_DATE(PAY_DATE_K) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM STORE WHERE STORE_STATUS ='N'
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM APPLICATION WHERE APP_YN = 'P'
